exceptions.tactic: apply (filterlim_comp_2 F1 F2 (fun x y => f x y)).
exceptions.exn: The reference F2 was not found in the current environment.
Applied theorem does not have enough premises.

original: intros Hlim_f Hg Hh. apply (filterlim_comp_2 F1 F2 (fun x y => f x y)). - apply Hlim_f. - apply filterlim_pair. + intros x. apply Hg. + apply Hh. - apply filterlim_ext with (fun x => l). + intros x. reflexivity. + apply filterlim_const.
